title: Who is Nate's mum in Emmerdale and is he really Cain's son? Fans speculate after twist
text:
Get the biggest soaps stories by email Subscribe Thank you for subscribing We have more newsletters Show me See our privacy notice Could not subscribe, try again later Invalid Email

Emmerdale's 'Who is Nate Robinson?' storyline finally came to an end on Tuesday, as the newcomer was confirmed to be the secret son of Cain Dingle - while his mum is currently unknown.

Cain was confronting the character over his affair with his wife Moira Dingle, with events taking a deadly turn on a boat in the middle of a lake.

But amid concerns for Moira as she fights for her life underwater after falling off the boat, there's bigger questions going around as some fans continue to believe he might not even be Cain's child.

Who is Nate's mother, have we met her before and what does it mean for the the Dingles now?

Here's everything we know so far...

Who is Nate Robinson? What's Nate's real name?

Nate, played by actor Jurell Carter, was a newcomer on the soap, first appearing during the big week in May where he met Rhona Goskirk in a nightclub.

But it seems this was just the start of his plan to make his way to the village, and seek revenge on Cain - his secret dad.

Not only did he start an affair with his wife Moira, he also got the mother of his child Kyle on side (Amy Wyatt) and attempted to have her seek full custody.

Viewers knew he had a vendetta against the village bad boy, but it was only confirmed in October that he was Cain's secret son - with his real name being Nathaniel.

Keep up with all the soap news Life moves fast in soapland, so make sure you stay up to date with all the latest from your favourite soaps with our regular email newsletter. Sign up using this form to receive regular updates on Corrie, Emmerdale, EastEnders direct to your inbox. We'll also keep you up to date on what your favourite stars are up to in the real world too, and the breaking news as it happens.

Is Nate Cain's son?

According to Nate, Cain is his father - while some viewers are expecting a new twist.

Some have suggested he might think he's Cain's child but this might not be the case, as others predicted Cain's mother Faith could in fact be his true parent.

Nate told Cain: "Do you see me now dad?" as he made the confession that they were in fact father and son.

(Image: Andrew Boyce)

Who is Nate's mum?

Emmerdale have yet to confirm the identity of Nate's mother, but it is thought it will be confirmed on Wednesday or Thursday.

Fans have been speculating over who she might be and whether we've seen her before, with his age not known so the time frame isn't clear.

One name fans have queried is his former flame Angie Reynolds who tragically died in 2002.

Emmerdale airs weeknights at 7pm on ITV with an extra episode at 8pm on Thursdays.
description: Emmerdale dropped a bombshell on Tuesday, as Nate Robinson confirmed his real identity that he's the son of Cain Dingle
